amendment.description: Manager's amendment consists of the text of the amendment contained in House Report 109-647 and printed on page H6575 in the Congressional Record for September 14, 2006.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-647 to modify 13 dates in various provisions of the bill to reflect the passage of time since the bill's introduction, which were not modified during the Committee's consideration; to correct one sectional cross reference and a reference to an Executive Branch agency; to add a provision explicitly requiring Federal Prison Industries (FPI) to establish a cost accounting system which was implicit in, and necessary to implement, the amendment by Rep. Issa which was adopted during Judiciary Committee consideration of the bill; and to make a grammatical correction to the Issa amendment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
